animal mummies. tombs of eternity: the afterlife in ancient egypt is a showcase for the major collection of egyptian antiquities held by the museum of fine arts, boston." the objects on display are extraordinary, said Victor Rabinovitch , president of the canadian museum of civilization corp. the ancient egyptians created an exceptional period of human civilization, and this exhibition helps us understand who they were, how they lived and what they believed.
